      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BoundingBox BoundingBox.clone() 
      static BoundingBox BoundingBox.getCenteredInstance(Vector2D center, float width, float height)
      This returns a BoundingBox of the given width and height, centered at the given Vector2D.
      BoundingBox BoundingBox.getIntersectedArea(BoundingBox other)
      Finds the area that is overlapping between this object and the given BoundingBox.
      BoundingBox BoundingBox.scale(float scale)
      Multiplies the width and height by the given scale.
      Methods in engine.math with parameters of type BoundingBox 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BoundingBox.Side BoundingBox.checkCollision(BoundingBox other)
      Returns the side of this rectangle that collided with the other box WARNING - Will fail at high speeds.
      double BoundingBox.distance(BoundingBox other)
      Calculates and returns the distance between the position of this BoundingBox and the position of the given BoundingBox.
      BoundingBox BoundingBox.getIntersectedArea(BoundingBox other)
      Finds the area that is overlapping between this object and the given BoundingBox.
      boolean BoundingBox.intersects(BoundingBox other)
      Checks to see if the given BoundingBox overlaps with this BoundingBox.
      Constructors in engine.math with parameters of type BoundingBox 
      Constructor and Description
      BoundingBox(BoundingBox other)
      Constructs a deep copy of the argument object so that this object is an independent copy of the original with the same values for x, y, width and height.
